In the aspect of feature selection and extraction, MobiPCR introduces the vulnerabilities features and improves the detection accuracy of malwares.
This paper presents MobiPCR, a novel mobile malware detection system, which can achieves 99.1% accuracy while strictly maintaining a significantly low false-positive rate.
MobiPCR is a concrete and ready-to-use system, there are no extra operations for users to utilize it and not resource-consuming for mobile devices.
